comments.body: schema evolution from int to bigint (which seems like a common use case?) is unsupported for Parquet atm - plan to address it in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SPARK-35461
can we also test with user-specified schema? What if the user-specified schema is not `decimal(20, 0)`? Do we return wrong result or fail?

diffHunk:

        makeRawParquetFile(path)
        readParquetFile(path.toString) { df =>
          checkAnswer(df, (-500 until 500).map { i =>
            val bi = UnsignedLong.fromLongBits(i % 100L).bigIntegerValue()
